It will be manned by 50 health workers from the Department of Health. Fri, 01 May 2020 00:57:04 +0800

PWD na hirap maglakad, pinapunta pa ng munisipyo ng Imus para makuha ang ayudang SAP tag:gmanetwork.com:news_story-736371 https://www.gmanetwork.com/news/news/ulatfilipino/736371/pwd-na-hirap-maglakad-pinapunta-pa-ng-munisipyo-ng-imus-para-makuha-ang-ayudang-sap/story/ Isang dating guro na person with disabilities (PWD) at hirap maglakad ang napilitang magpunta sa munisipyo ng Imus sa Cavite para matanggap ang pinansiyal na ayuda mula sa social amelioration program (SAP). Fri, 01 May 2020 00:10:28 +0800

Fri, 01 May 2020 00:04:56 +0800
Special permits needed for PUVs to resume operations in GCQ areas, says LTFRB tag:gmanetwork.com:news_story-736368 https://www.gmanetwork.com/news/news/nation/736368/special-permits-needed-for-puvs-to-resume-operations-in-gcq-areas-says-ltfrb/story/ As some areas will have a more relaxed travel restriction protocol under general community quarantine (GCQ) beginning on Friday, the Land Transportation Franchising and Regulatory Board (LTFRB) has required public utility vehicles (PUV) to secure a special permit. Thu, 30 Apr 2020 23:57:58 +0800
BuCor invites Muntinlupa execs to check Site Harry, insists residents near NBP safe tag:gmanetwork.com:news_story-736367 https://www.gmanetwork.com/news/news/metro/736367/bucor-invites-muntinlupa-execs-to-check-site-harry-insists-residents-near-nbp-safe/story/ "Kaya nga ini-invite ko si Congressman Biazon, si Mayor mismo, ay pumunta dito at i-inspect niya. Para wala na speculation na hindi fit itong Site Harry natin," BuCor Director General Gerald Bantag said. "Kung may violation kami dito ay handa kaming sumunod. Sabi ko nga, nandyan 'yung partners natin. Bakit nila pinapayagan itong Site Harry na 'yan? Dahil nakita nila, maganda," he added. Thu, 30 Apr 2020 23:48:25 +0800
Covid, Corona and Lockdown: the newborns named after a pandemic tag:gmanetwork.com:news_story-736366 https://www.gmanetwork.com/news/news/world/736366/covid-corona-and-lockdown-the-newborns-named-after-a-pandemic/story/ First there was Corona Kumar, then Covid Marie: parents have taken to naming newborns after the coronavirus, apparently unperturbed by the prospect of their children being forever associated with a deadly pandemic. Thu, 30 Apr 2020 23:46:00 +0800

Thu, 30 Apr 2020 23:32:51 +0800

Coronavirus was 'not manmade or genetically modified' -U.S. spy agency tag:gmanetwork.com:news_story-736362 https://www.gmanetwork.com/news/news/world/736362/coronavirus-was-not-manmade-or-genetically-modified-u-s-spy-agency/story/ WASHINGTON - The top U.S. spy agency said for the first time on Thursday that the American intelligence community believes the COVID-19 virus that originated in China was not man-made or genetically modified.
